heading: Frequently Asked Questions
description: Find answers to common questions about our platform and services.

faqs.question: What is Kivon Exchange?
faqs.answer: Kivon Exchange is a platform for buying and selling cryptocurrencies.

faqs.question: How do I create an account?
faqs.answer: To create an account, you need to sign up with your email address and create a password.

faqs.question: How can I swap my coins?
faqs.answer: You can swap your coins by clicking the 'Swap' button on the home page.

faqs.question: How can I swap my coins?
faqs.answer: You can swap your coins by clicking the 'Swap' button on the home page.
